Text.Page: Sorryâ€”I only process requests from guild masters who have yet to join an alliance.

Which alliance strikes your heart's desire?

The Free Traders Collective attracts money while the Enlightened Union attracts favor and reputation, and the Iron Order values combat above all.

Just let me know, and I'll get you all signed up!

You're interested in alliances?

I know most about the Free Traders Collective, as they congregate here in Velika. The Free Traders seek unrestricted trade of noctenium.

The Enlightened Union wants equitable sharing of noctenium. And the Iron Order values believes noctenium should be used to strengthen our soldiers.

Sadly, only guild masters get to select which they'll join.
Oh! We aren't quite ready for volunteers right now. Try back later.
